definition: Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself

sentences.english: Clinton told them he wanted to go as far as they could with Yeltsin.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿说他想走到他们能叶利钦与。

sentences.english: Russia reformer and former president Boris Yeltsin dies at 76.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯前总统叶利钦去世，享年76岁。

sentences.english: He became deputy to the head of Yeltsin\'s general-affairs department.
sentences.chinese: 他成为叶利钦的不管部副手。

sentences.english: The ruble and the financial markets collapsed, and Yeltsin was a spent force.
sentences.chinese: 卢布和经济一起垮台，叶利钦是消费者。

sentences.english: Yeltsin gets a warm welcome during his presidential campaign visit to Kazan. (1996)
sentences.chinese: 叶利钦在他的总统竞选期间访问喀山，受到热烈欢迎。

sentences.english: Yeltsin was polite and friendly, but slightly patronizing.
sentences.chinese: 叶利钦很客气，很友好，稍微有点屈尊俯就的架势。

sentences.english: Yeltsin raises a bouquet in celebration of his election win.
sentences.chinese: 大选获胜后，叶利钦手捧著鲜花庆祝。

sentences.english: Yeltsin ruled out direct peace talks with rebel leader Jokhar Dudayev.
sentences.chinese: 叶利钦决定不与叛军领袖杜达耶夫举行和平谈判。

sentences.english: He was different from Mr Yeltsin in age and temperament.
sentences.chinese: 普京与叶利钦在年龄和脾气上都大不相同。

definition: Gorbachev/Mikhail Sergeyevich Gorbachev (1931-), last president of the Soviet Union 1991-1995
Nikita Khrushchev (1894-1971), secretary-general of Soviet Communist Party 1953-1964
Leonid Brezhnev (1906-1982), Soviet statesman, General Secretary of the Communist Party of the USSR 1966-1982
Soviet Communist Party/abbr. for 蘇聯共產黨|苏联共产党[Su1 lian2 Gong4 chan3 dang3]
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
KGB (Soviet secret police)/member of the KGB
Vladimir Ilyich Lenin (1870-1924), Russian revolutionary leader
Leon Davidovich Trotsky (1879-1940), early Bolshevik leader, exiled by Stalin in 1929 and murdered in 1940

pinyin: Na4 zha1 er3 ba1 ye1 fu1

definition: Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
